DOC.brief_summary: The current study examines efficacy two treatment help child cystic fibrosis ( CF ) meet dietary calorie requirement 120 % 150 % recommend daily allowance energy effect treatment weight gain maintenance . One treatment provide child CF parent nutrition education best food meet dietary need . The second treatment give child CF family similar nutritional information plus behavioral parenting method motivate child eat recommend food . Children CF family see weekly 7 treatment session across 9 week active phase treatment . Families follow 2 year treatment order well understand long treatment effective determine health benefit good nutrition status weight gain .
DOC.criteria: Weight percentile age height 40th age sex Pancreatic insufficiency Developmental delay Pseudomonas cepacia Supplemental enteral parenteral nutrition
